"Friendly family staff and great selection "From design to delivery, it was a good experience and we love the final product." "Love this place and I am treated like family!"

From design to delivery, it was a good experience and we love the final product. We didn't know much about building a pool and we didn't have to. They listened to our wants during design, gave us great choices to pick from, suggested options we didn't know existed and gave us a pool that we love.

We had an exceptional experience with CTX Pool and Patio during the construction of our new Pool House. Greg and Mickey made the process incredibly smooth, even when we made several changes during the design and construction phases. … More Response from the owner 10 months ago
